comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Damn, I love a good pedicure. I found I could save a heckuva lot of money, though by bypassing the boutique joints downtown... and the kids at VoTech threw in a free haircut today to boot. Can I borrow someone's ball cap until the end of the year? I'm hoofin' again today, hoping the trails aren't still total muckpots. Back on wheels tomorrow. DU
